dcterms:creator: A. Krizhevsky
dcterms:description: The CIFAR-100 dataset consists of 100 categories, with 500 images for training and 100 images for testing in each class. Images are padded and randomly cropped to a size of 32x32.
dcterms:title: CIFAR-100

dcterms:creator: S.-A. RebufÔ¨Å

dcterms:description: ImageNet-Subset contains 100 classes sampled from ImageNet, with approximately 1,300 training and 50 test images per class. Images are resized and randomly cropped during training.
dcterms:title: ImageNet-Subset
